Bill Clinton: s statement: The claim is supported by Bill Clinton himself, who stated in an interview that he believed he had the lowest net worth of any American president in the 20th century when he took office.
Financial reports: The expert mentions that the Clintons' combined net worth is approximately $55 million, making Bill Clinton one of the wealthiest living presidents. This information contradicts the claim of having the lowest net worth.
Income from speeches: The expert highlights that Bill Clinton earned over $100 million from speeches given between 2001 and 2013. This substantial income suggests that his net worth was not the lowest among American presidents.
Hillary Clinton: s income: The expert mentions that Hillary Clinton earned a significant salary as a lawyer and partner in a law firm before Bill Clinton became president. This indicates that their combined income was substantial even before they entered the White House, further contradicting the claim.
